text: A Calamitous Elopement is a 1908 American silent comedy movie directed by D. W. GriffithA CALAMITOUS ELOPEMENTA Calamitous Elopement and stars Harry Solter, Linda Arvidson, and Charles Inslee. ==Actors== * Harry Solter as Frank * Linda Arvidson as Jennie * Charles Inslee as Jennie's Father * George Gebhardt as Bill, a Thief * John R. Cumpson * D. W. Griffith as Policeman * Robert Harron as Bellboy * Florence Lawrence * Anthony O'Sullivan ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1908 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: A Calamitous Elopement
